trait.name: Amphibious
text: The homarid can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The homarid makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). The homarid has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
